mapper.select: SELECT `user`.`email` AS `email`, `user`.`name` AS `name`, `user`.`nickname` AS `nickname`, `user`.`tel` AS `tel`, `user`.`address` AS `address`, `user`.`role` AS `role`, `user`.`is_state` AS `isState`, `user`.`is_insurance` AS `isInsurance`, `a`.`check_in` AS `checkIn`, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM `dcs`.`submit_images` AS `images` LEFT JOIN `dcs`.`work` AS `work` on `work`.`index` = `images`.`work_index` WHERE `user_email` = #{email} AND `work`.`work_date` = #{workDate}) AS `count` FROM `dcs`.`user` LEFT JOIN `dcs`.`attendance` AS `a` ON `user`.`email` = `a`.`user_email`
